name: L.A. Crime City Open World
description:
The game present to you the big open world of L.A. You have a huge vehicle park of autos, bikes, boats which are provided with realistic physics
Big open world allowed you never get bored because you have a lots of missions to do. Collect money after you finish mission and for that money you can buy a lots of guns or cars & motobikes or some business such as casino, taxi park, port and many many more!

Features:
- Open world
- Missions
- 50 Cars
- 12 Boats
- 10 Motobikes
- FUN)
